reviewText: I enjoyed the story line and felt the lead actors did a good job with the roles they played in the film.
Bad movie, bad acting all around.  Do not recommed this movie to anyone.  I gave it away.

This is one of Michael Pare's best film - playing a drunk really expanded him. However the producers/directors must have figured their audience had no intelligence for some of the ridiculous things that appeared out of nowhere.
slow to get to the good parts but its good for when nothing is on tv.
